blueprints.choose_next: Great Work! Choose Your Next Project
blueprints.select_project: Pick a blueprint to build next

castle.title: Castle
castle.description: Build a magical castle with towers and roofs

airplane.title: Airplane
airplane.description: Create a flying airplane with wings and propeller

house.title: House
house.description: Build a cozy house with windows and a tree

tutor.intro:
Hey Shape Shifter! 👋
Let's build a magical castle using shapes! 🧱🔺🟡
Follow the blueprint, step by step!
tutor.rectangle_base:
This is a 🔷 rectangle!
It has 2 long sides and 2 short sides.
We'll use it as the base of your castle! 🏰
➡️ Drag the 🔷 rectangle to the middle of the blueprint!
tutor.square_hall:
This is a 🟪 square!
All 4 sides are equal. It's strong and balanced 💪
➡️ Place the 🟪 square on top of the 🔷 rectangle. It's the big castle hall!
tutor.rectangles_towers:
Let's add 2 more 🔷 rectangles for the tall side towers! 🏰🏰
➡️ Place one 🔷 on the left... now one 🔷 on the right! Nicely done!
tutor.triangles_roofs:
This is a 🔺 triangle!
It has 3 sides and makes a great roof! ⛺
➡️ Let's place a 🔺 triangle on each tower! That's 3 rooftops total!
👏 You're roofing like a pro!
tutor.circle_sun:
Here comes the 🟠 circle!
It's round, smooth, and has no corners. 🌞
➡️ Place the 🟠 circle high up in the sky—it's the sun!
🌟 Let there be light!
tutor.rectangle_trunk:
Let's plant a tree!
We'll start with a 🔷 rectangle for the trunk 🌳
➡️ Place the 🔷 rectangle on the side of your castle.
tutor.pentagon_leaves:
This is a 🟡 pentagon—it has 5 sides!
We'll use it as the leafy part of the tree 🍃
➡️ Place the 🟡 pentagon on top of the 🔷 rectangle. Tree complete!
tutor.blueprint_complete:
🎉 Amazing! Your {{blueprintName}} is finished!
🎨 Ready for your next building challenge?
tutor.explore_mode:
Now it's your turn to be the boss!
In Explore Mode, you can drop shapes anywhere!
💡 Try stacking, rotating, or making your own wacky castle!
🎠 Treehouse? Robot tower? Go wild!

encouragements.triangle_fits: That 🔺 triangle fits like a glove! 💯
encouragements.try_higher: Hmm… try placing that one a little higher ⬆️

3d_shapes.rectangle:
You clicked the 🔷 rectangle! In 3D, it's a rectangular prism 📦
It has 6 sides—like a box. Perfect for walls and towers!
3d_shapes.square:
Whoa! That 🟪 square turned into a cube 🎲
A cube has 6 equal sides, just like a dice!
3d_shapes.triangle:
This 🔺 triangle became a triangular prism ⛰️
It looks like a tent—great for making rooftops!
3d_shapes.circle:
Look! The 🟠 circle turned into a sphere 🟠
It's perfectly round—like a ball or the sun!
3d_shapes.pentagon:
This 🟡 pentagon is now a pentagonal prism 🪵
It has 5 sides on the front and back—kind of like a chunky leaf!

tutor.no_shapes_hint: No shapes placed yet! Switch to Blueprint view and place shapes to see them in 3D.

ui.no_shapes_long: No shapes placed yet! Switch to Blueprint view and place shapes to see them here.
ui.no_shapes_short: No shapes yet! Use Blueprint view to place shapes.
